string: 内容
content
Come on, I can't wait any longer!
We have enough space for a Cinema now. Let's start building!
You can build a Cinema now. Let's go!
We need more space to build a Filming Studio. Let's expand the top floor!
We have enough space for a Filming Studio now. Let's start building!
We can build a Filming Studio now. Let's go!
Let's start filming!
I've contacted a few scriptwriters. Let's take a look at their screenplays!
The scriptwriters have provided three screenplays. When choosing, don't forget to consider what genres your actors are good at!
Let's go with this one!

Even though we don't have a choice now, pay attention to what your actors are talented at for future castings. If they are a good match for a character in the screenplay, the movie is sure to be great!
It's time to choose the shooting type. If the shooting type matches the screenplay, the film will be greatly improved.
You can view your movie earnings here.
You've viewed your movie earnings before. Now it's time to collect them!
Come on, tap to collect your earnings!
We need more space to build an Actor Department. Let's expand the top floor!
The Actor Department is awaiting construction. Our journey starts here!
We can now build an Actor Department! Let's do it!
Let's look at the list of actors.
Now we can ask our talent scout to discover new actors!
Use your talent scout to search for potential actors!
These are all the currently available actors. Sign a contract with an actor you like!
Let's look at the list of actors.
Select an actor to upgrade.
You can upgrade your actor here!
We need more space to build a Market Department. Let's expand our top floor!
Build a Market Department and take our company to the next level!
We can now build a Market Department. Let's do it!
Let's take a look at our market territories!
From here, you can enter the street and start advertising!
You can start advertising here!
Let's take a look at our Market Department!
You can upgrade your Market Department here!
Here you can view the earnings situation for currently showing movies.
You need to use brochures to increase a movie's buzz!
Let's take a look at our market territories!
From here, you can enter the street and start advertising!
